USE electric_vehicle_ldw
GO

-- Create view for "vw_quantity_of_vehicle_by_type"
DROP  VIEW IF EXISTS gold.vw_quantity_of_vehicle_by_type
GO

CREATE VIEW gold.vw_quantity_of_vehicle_by_type
AS
    SELECT  
        *
    FROM
        OPENROWSET(
            BULK 'gold/quantity_of_vehicle_by_type/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
            DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_src',
            FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
        )
        WITH(
            year                        SMALLINT,
            month                       TINYINT,
            make                        VARCHAR(25),
            electric_vehicle_type       VARCHAR(40),
            vehicle_register_count      INT            
        )
        AS [result]
    GO

    SELECT * FROM gold.vw_quantity_of_vehicle_by_type
    GO


--Create view for "vehicle_registered_by_year_and_month"
    DROP VIEW IF EXISTS gold.vw_vehicle_registered_by_year_and_month
    GO

    CREATE VIEW gold.vw_vehicle_registered_by_year_and_month
    AS
    SELECT * 
    FROM 
        OPENROWSET(
            BULK 'gold/vehicle_registered_by_year_and_month/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
            DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_src',
            FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
        )
        WITH( 
            year                    SMALLINT,
            month                   TINYINT,
            registration_date       DATETIME2(7),
            vin                     VARCHAR(10),
            model_year              SMALLINT,
            make                    VARCHAR(50),
            model                   VARCHAR(25),
            electric_range          SMALLINT,
            longitude               FLOAT, 
            latitude                FLOAT, 
            country                 VARCHAR(30),
            city                    VARCHAR(30),
            state                   VARCHAR(2),
            postal_code             VARCHAR(5)
        )
        AS [result]
        GO 

        Select * from gold.vw_vehicle_registered_by_year_and_month
        WHERE year = 2024 and month = 6
        GO
